name: What's the word 3 Jr - 2 in 1
description:
Hey KIDS ! We are back with a new word Guessing Game ,Specially for you Young Ones out There ! Whats The Word 3 JR - 2 in 1

★★★★ WE ARE LOOKING FOR 2 WORDS WHICH JOIN TO MAKE A SINGLE WORD !!!!! ★★★★★
Each puzzle contains two pictures of two different words but when you join them , BANG ! you get ONE WORD !!! ( eg : RAIN + BOW = RAINBOW)

★ HAND PICKED PHOTOS FOR SUPER FUN ★
No registration, no complicated rules. Just start playing and have fun!

★SIMPLE AND HIGHLY ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY★
What is the word we are looking for? Look at the TWO pictures, JOIN THEM TOGETHER and win !!!!

All the Best !!!!!
